alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Nassau, northeastern St. Johns, eastern Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Jekyll Island to near Durbin. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fernandina Beach, Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Neptune Beach, World Golf Village, Sawgrass, Nocatee, Durbin, Craig Field and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
